kv17.10:1.4: Nanu bhagavā dvipadānaṁ aggo, dvipadānaṁ seṭṭho, dvipadānaṁ pamokkho, dvipadānaṁ uttamo, dvipadānaṁ pavaro asamo asamasamo appaṭisamo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggaloti?
kv17.10:1.6: Hañci bhagavā dvipadānaṁ aggo, dvipadānaṁ seṭṭho, dvipadānaṁ pamokkho, dvipadānaṁ uttamo, dvipadānaṁ pavaro asamo asamasamo appaṭisamo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv17.10:2.8: sīlena samādhinā paññāya, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv17.10:4.2: Buddhena seṭṭho ca samo ca vijjati;
kv17.10:5.4: Na vattabbaṁ buddhassa dinnaṁ mahapphalantikathā niṭṭhitā.
